snippet: The 11 students, who staged the sit-in to protest the possibility that undergraduates will be charged tuition, said their actions had focused attention on the issue.
abstract: The 11 students, who staged the sit-in to protest the possibility that undergraduates will be charged tuition, said their actions had focused attention on the issue.

headline.main: Cooper Union Students End Occupation of Suite After a Week
